      • getQuestions

        @GET
@Path("/getquestions")
@Produces("application/json")
@Consumes("application/json")
public void getQuestions​(@Context
                         javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                         @Context
                         javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        Method for getting all of the questions into a list by Daojpa method "getQuestions". Method sends list of questions to browsequestions.jsp
        Parameters:
        request -
        response -

      • getOneQuestion

        @GET
@Path("/showquestion/{question_id}")
@Produces("application/json")
@Consumes("application/json")
public void getOneQuestion​(@PathParam("question_id")
                           int ques_id,
                           @Context
                           javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                           @Context
                           javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        Gets question-to-edit id from browsequestions.jsp, sends it to Daojpa and gets the question object back. Sends it to editquestion.jsp in to a textfield
        Parameters:
        ques_id -
        request -
        response -

      • updateQuestionWithForm

        @POST
@Path("/updatequestion")
@Produces("application/json")
@Consumes("application/x-www-form-urlencoded")
public void updateQuestionWithForm​(@FormParam("question_id")
                                   int quesid,
                                   @FormParam("question")
                                   java.lang.String question,
                                   @Context
                                   javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                   @Context
                                   javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        Reads form from editquestion.jsp with POST-method and FormParams, makes a new object from it and sends it to Daojpa for updating the question. Gets back all the questions from database into a list and sends it to browsequestions.jsp
        Parameters:
        quesid -
        question -
        request -
        response -

      • addQuestion

        @POST
@Path("/addquestion")
@Produces("application/xhtml+xml")
@Consumes("application/x-www-form-urlencoded")
public void addQuestion​(@FormParam("question")
                        java.lang.String question,
                        @Context
                        javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                        @Context
                        javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        Method adds a question to a database. First creating new question object and add the question inside it and send it to Daojpas method addQuestion. After that method calls Daojpas method which add all candidates answer to zero for the new question. Dao returns the question to a list and method sends the list to browsequestions.jpa.
        Parameters:
        question -
        request -
        response -

      • deleteQuestion

        @GET
@Path("/deletequestion/{question_id}")
@Produces("application/json")
@Consumes("application/json")
public void deleteQuestion​(@PathParam("question_id")
                           int question_id,
                           @Context
                           javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                           @Context
                           javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        Removes a question and answers related to given question id. Refreshes the page by reading questions from the database Gets question_id from browsequestions.jsp and send the refreshed list back to browsequestions.jsp
        Parameters:
        question_id -
        request -
        response -

      • addCandidate

        @POST
@Path("/addcandidate")
@Consumes("multipart/form-data")
public void addCandidate​(java.io.InputStream fileInputStream,
                         org.glassfish.jersey.media.multipart.FormDataContentDisposition fileMetaData,
                         java.lang.String fname,
                         java.lang.String lname,
                         java.lang.String party,
                         java.lang.String munic,
                         java.lang.String age,
                         java.lang.String prof,
                         java.lang.String promo,
                         @Context
                         javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                         @Context
                         javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response,
                         @Context
                         javax.servlet.ServletContext sc)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Gets new candidates info using FormDataParams from addcandidate.jsp and saves the info to object Candidate. Then sends object to a daoJpa and saves candidates info to a database. After that method calls daojpas method "addAnswersToNewCandidate, finally in the end sends the object by setAttribute to a adminviewcand.jsp.
        Parameters:
        fileInputStream -
        fileMetaData -
        fname -
        lname -
        party -
        munic -
        age -
        prof -
        promo -
        request -
        response -
        sc -
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
